idea-plugin.name: Base16 Nova
idea-plugin.vendor: George Essig (https://github.com/gessig), Trevor D. Miller (https://trevordmiller.com), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Nova for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by George Essig (https://github.com/gessig), Trevor D. Miller (https://trevordmiller.com). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
